name: Cavorting Amongst the Corpses
description:
My very first game jam game for the Idle Thumbs #WizardJam. Unfortunately unfinished; there's a lot I had to cut for time, including a proper ending, but I'm very happy with how the systems came together.  No sound, windowed only. Enjoy, and stay spicy.

PROTIP: Blocking is essential for success! Blocking an enemy's attack puts them in a stun state where they take way, way more damage. You have two blocking stances, high and low, and all enemies have a high and a low attack. The yellow warning symbol that appears right before an enemy attacks indicates what kind of attack it's going to be, and it's up to you to block accordingly.
